title: IDEA: Ability to allocate specific items to certain bag slots
body:
i.e. sightstone going straight to the second slot (as long as it is free) as opposed to the first empty slot (if in this case the first and second slots were both empty).

It isn't anything major, but a little pet peeve of mine having to move around items once I buy them. 

Just thought I'd mention it and see if anyone else has thought about it! 

Also not sure if it makes sense???

PS. Is it called a bag? Or inventory?
